name: The Light _Journey Within
description:
The Light_Journey Within is a 3D survival game in which Player is a wisp of Light that has to make choices in a harsh, vicious environment to survive and do whatever it takes to reach the center or the maze.

The game environment is alluding to the inner mental world where one has to survive and deal with various unresolved emotions on the daily basis.

At the moment this prototype implements the natural selection feel to the survival aspect. The choice mechanics will come later

The idea for this game was born in a game jam, but now is in development as a Bachelors project for Multimedia Design studies.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Move WASD, charge lazor hold Space bar and release
